code_save_question.text: Do you want me to save the code to a file? So you can read it?

code_save_done.text: Okay, I saved the code to code_output.txt in the code folder of my files.

init.text: Welcome back sir. I have finished initializing. Shall I start with default paramaters?

explain.text: Would you like me to explain this furthur?

text_input_only.text: I will no longer look for a face to start listening. You can now type to receive a responce.

respond_talk_off.text: I will no longer respond vocally to your inputs.

respond_talk_on.text: I will now respond vocally to your inputs.

looking_for_face.text: I will use face detection to determin when I listen for inputs.

wake_up.text: I'm awake and ready to get started.
